text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Up your nose with a Clorox filled hose.  Here comes another wave of Coronavirus because of the morons in the Republican party. All Trump is going to do is gaslight, lie and disrespect the news reporters again.   What will be his next remedy to kill and maim?
